description: Try this easy, make-ahead quiche Lorraine recipe for a deliciously creamy filling encased in flaky filo pastry.
keywords: Quiche,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg,Low sugar,Sesame free,Summer,Mother's Day,High protein,Soy free,Picnic,Jan Feb 2021,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Easy Filo Quiche Lorraine Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 rindless middle bacon rashers, fat trimmed, diced
2 small red onions, thinly sliced into rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fanforced. Grease a 17 x 27cm slice pan with extra butter.
Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add bacon and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until crispy.
Layer and brush each filo sheet with butter. Press filo stack into pan, then trim pastry, leaving a 4cm border above pan edges.

Lightly whisk egg and milk in a medium jug, then pour over pastry base. Top with onion, bacon and bocconcini, then bake for 30 minutes or until just set in centre. Stand in pan for 10 minutes. Season, slice and serve with baby spinach.
